text:
*Extensions (app cards) for help desk:* The ticket sidebar in help desk workspace has become much more extensible with App Cards (aka UI extensions) that are rolled out today along with public beta for UI extensibility. You can now build private apps with deeper customization and solve for custom integrations or business processes in your account through this beta.

:arrow_forward: Watch this <https://www.loom.com/share/98b0a13f369049b7915da24e2604e2d4?sid=e9a9aec8-07fa-41d8-897f-fafcef89d01a|video> to find more.
